Rect definitions.

Types

FPoint {.bycopy, final, pure.} = object
  x*: cfloat
  y*: cfloat
Point (floating point). 
FRect {.bycopy, final, pure.} = object
  x*: cfloat
  y*: cfloat
  w*: cfloat
  h*: cfloat
Rectangle (floating point). 
Point {.bycopy, final, pure.} = object
  x*: cint
  y*: cint
Point (integer). 
Rect {.bycopy, final, pure.} = object
  x*: cint
  y*: cint
  w*: cint
  h*: cint
Rectangle (integer).
